snippet: The coming Jeff Koons survey at the Whitney Museum of American Art will consume more space than the museum has ever devoted to a single artist.
abstract: Whitney Museum of American Art is hosting first major retrospective of artist Jeff Koons as its grand finale before moving to new home in Manhattan's Meatpacking District; exhibition will consume more space than museum has ever devoted to a single artist.
lead_paragraph: The coming Jeff Koons survey at the Whitney Museum of American Art will consume more space than the museum has ever devoted to a single artist.

headline.seo: Whitney Restrospective for Jeff Koons’s Monumental Ambitions
headline.main: Think Big. Build Big. Sell Big.
headline.print_headline: Think Big. Build Big. Sell Big.
